name: pinchpenny

showing an unwillingness to spend money: After a year of marriage, I was growing tired of my husband's pinchpenny ways. The film was shot on a pinchpenny budget of less than a million dollars.
More examplesFewer examplesThe excellent acting performances just about make up for the film's pinchpenny production values.She was a pinchpenny homemaker who hated to pay full price for anything.

a person who is unwilling to spend money: Tell that pinchpenny that if he had bought the proper tools, he wouldn't be in such trouble now. A couple of pinchpennies could dine here for £50, but it's easy to spend much more.
More examplesFewer examplesIt's good to be sensible with money, but she's one of the worst pinchpennies I've ever met.
